Run the ggquickeda application

Source: R/run_ggquickeda.R
run_ggquickeda.Rd

Run the ggquickeda application.

Usage

run_ggquickeda(data = NULL, ...)

Arguments

data

The initial data.frame to load into the application.

...

Additional arguments for bookmarking

Examples

if (interactive()) {
  run_ggquickeda()
}
